thread.title: A Concerned Turkey Physically Breaks Up an Impending Fight Between Two Stubborn Roosters
thread.title_full: A Concerned Turkey Physically Breaks Up an Impending Fight Between Two Stubborn Roosters

author: Lori Dorn
title: A Concerned Turkey Physically Breaks Up an Impending Fight Between Two Stubborn Roosters
text:
While watching tension grow between two roosters who feeding upon the grass, a concerned turkey decided to take matters into his own claws and physically acted as a blockade between the stubborn birds, chasing off the one who appeared to be the interloper in the situation.

via reddit
